title: Ajax: Rebel Initiate/Ajax: Anarchist Extreme
text:
[interrupt] → When you are flatlined on your turn, flip this identity instead of losing the game. The Corp trashes the top X cards of R&D. X is equal to the amount of damage you have suffered this turn.

Flip side:
Ajax: Anarchist Extreme
Identity: Inhuman

Your maximum hand size is 0. This cannot be modified.
[interrupt] → If you would be flatlined on your turn, you may trash the top card of your stack and lose any remaining clicks instead of losing the game.
flavor: No rest! No peace!Flip side:WHATEVER THE COST!
